Package com.github.gayanch.cache.store

Interface Storage<K,​V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of CacheKey
    V - The type of CacheValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemStorage, InMemoryStorage
    public interface Storage<K,​V>
    Storage interface defines the contract for various storage backends to be used for cache storage

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getMaxSize()
      Get the configured max size of the storage backend
      V read​(K key)
      Reads and returns the CacheValue for given key from storage backend
      V remove​(K key)
      Removes the CacheEntry of given key
      void setMaxSize​(int maxSize)
      Set maximum size of the storage backend
      int size()
      Get the current capacity of the storage backend
      void store​(K key, V value)
      Stores the given key, value combination in storage backend

    • Method Detail

      • store

        void store​(K key,
           V value)
    throws StorageFullException
        Stores the given key, value combination in storage backend
        Parameters:
        key - The CacheKey
        value - The CacheValue
        Throws:
        StorageFullException - When the storage backend exceeded the configured max storage size

      • read

        V read​(K key)
        Reads and returns the CacheValue for given key from storage backend
        Parameters:
        key - The CacheKey
        Returns:
        The CacheValue if found. Null otherwise.

      • remove

        V remove​(K key)
        Removes the CacheEntry of given key
        Parameters:
        key - The CacheKey
        Returns:
        The CacheValue of given key if found in the storage backend. Null otherwise.

      • size

        int size()
        Get the current capacity of the storage backend
        Returns:
        The current capacity

        Get the configured max size of the storage backend
